incidents.name: Call Failures From TIM Network Subscribers in Brazil to a Subset of Twilio Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We have identified recovery on calls from Twilio's phone numbers to network subscribers in Brazil, nevertheless, we have identified that TIM network subscribers are still facing failures when connecting calls to a subset of Twilio's phone numbers in Brazil. incidents.name: Call Setup Failures for Twilio SIP via Interconnect on US2 Edge

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting degraded performance and intermittent call setup failures due to a loss of IP addresses for certain hosts in the US2 region has been resolved and voice services are functioning normally at this time.

We have started seeing recovery for the degraded performance and intermittent call setup failures caused by a loss of IP addresses for certain hosts in the US2 region. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery and expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.
We have identified that Programmable Voice calls using the PSTN are affected by an issue related to a loss of IP addresses for certain hosts in the US2 region during a recent maintenance event.

Our engineering teams have identified that the issue is related to a loss of IP addresses for certain hosts in the US2 region during a recent maintenance event. While most traffic is being rerouted and voice services remain available, some customers may still experience degraded performance or intermittent call setup failures. Our engineering teams are actively working to resolve the issues. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
